recommendations.title: Add FAQPage Schema
recommendations.marketing_copy: Implementing FAQPage schema helps AI systems understand your frequently asked questions.
recommendations.why_it_matters: AI systems rely on structured data to surface your content in answer boxes.
recommendations.what_to_do: Add FAQPage schema to pages with question-answer content.
recommendations.how_to_do: Use JSON-LD format to mark up your FAQ content.

recommendations.title: Add Organization Schema
recommendations.marketing_copy: Organization schema helps AI systems identify and display your company information.
recommendations.why_it_matters: Establishes your entity in AI knowledge graphs.
recommendations.what_to_do: Add Organization schema to your homepage.
recommendations.how_to_do: Include logo, name, URL, and contact information in JSON-LD.

recommendations.title: Optimize Meta Description
recommendations.marketing_copy: A well-crafted meta description improves how AI summarizes your content.
recommendations.why_it_matters: Meta descriptions are often used as source material for AI-generated summaries.
recommendations.what_to_do: Write a compelling meta description that summarizes the page content.
recommendations.how_to_do: Keep it under 160 characters and include your primary keywords.

recommendations.title: Add Speakable Schema
recommendations.marketing_copy: Speakable schema helps voice assistants identify content suitable for reading aloud.
recommendations.why_it_matters: Voice search is growing rapidly; speakable markup positions your content for voice results.
recommendations.what_to_do: Add Speakable schema to key content sections.
recommendations.how_to_do: Mark up headlines and summary paragraphs with speakable properties.

recommendations.title: Fix Heading Hierarchy
recommendations.marketing_copy: Proper heading hierarchy helps AI understand content structure and topic relationships.
recommendations.why_it_matters: AI models use heading structure to determine content hierarchy and relevance.
recommendations.what_to_do: Ensure headings follow a logical H1 > H2 > H3 hierarchy.
recommendations.how_to_do: Audit each page for skipped heading levels and fix the nesting order.

recommendations.title: Update Robots.txt for AI Crawlers
recommendations.marketing_copy: Ensure AI crawlers can access your important content.
recommendations.why_it_matters: AI bots need crawler access to index and reference your content.
recommendations.what_to_do: Review robots.txt to allow AI-specific crawlers.
recommendations.how_to_do: Add User-agent rules for GPTBot, Google-Extended, and similar AI crawlers.

recommendations.title: Add Article Schema
recommendations.marketing_copy: Article schema helps AI systems understand and cite your published content.
recommendations.why_it_matters: Structured article data improves how AI models reference your content.
recommendations.what_to_do: Add Article schema to blog posts and news articles.
recommendations.how_to_do: Include author, datePublished, headline, and image properties.

recommendations.title: Improve Internal Linking
recommendations.marketing_copy: Strong internal linking helps AI models understand topic relationships on your site.
recommendations.why_it_matters: AI systems use link structure to determine content authority and relationships.
recommendations.what_to_do: Add contextual internal links between related content pages.
recommendations.how_to_do: Use descriptive anchor text linking to topically relevant pages.

recommendations.title: Optimize XML Sitemap
recommendations.marketing_copy: An optimized sitemap helps AI crawlers discover and prioritize your content.
recommendations.why_it_matters: Sitemaps guide crawlers to your most important pages efficiently.
recommendations.what_to_do: Ensure sitemap is complete, updated, and includes priority hints.
recommendations.how_to_do: Add lastmod dates, priority values, and remove non-indexable URLs.

recommendations.title: Add HowTo Schema
recommendations.marketing_copy: HowTo schema helps AI systems display step-by-step instructions from your content.
recommendations.why_it_matters: AI assistants frequently surface how-to content for user queries.
recommendations.what_to_do: Add HowTo schema to instructional content pages.
recommendations.how_to_do: Mark up each step with name, text, and optional image properties.

recommendations.title: Add Descriptive Alt Text
recommendations.marketing_copy: Descriptive alt text helps AI models understand image content for multimodal search.
recommendations.why_it_matters: Multimodal AI systems use alt text to index and describe images.
recommendations.what_to_do: Write descriptive alt text for all meaningful images.
recommendations.how_to_do: Describe what the image shows, its context, and relevance to the page.

recommendations.title: Improve Page Load Speed
recommendations.marketing_copy: Fast-loading pages are favored by AI systems that consider user experience signals.
recommendations.why_it_matters: Performance metrics influence AI ranking and citation preferences.
recommendations.what_to_do: Optimize Core Web Vitals scores across key pages.
recommendations.how_to_do: Compress images, defer non-critical JS, and enable browser caching.
